content: प्रतिपद् {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To step or go towards, approach, resort or betake oneself to; उमामुखं तु प्रतिपद्य लोला द्विसंश्रयां प्रीतिमवाप लक्ष्मीः <ls>Ku. 1. 43.</ls> {@--2@} To enter upon, step upon, take, follow (as a way &c.); इतः पंथानं प्रतिपद्यस्व <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; प्रतिपत्स्ये पदवीमहं तव <ls>Ku. 4. 10.</ls> {@--3@} To arrive at, reach, attain; <ls>Śi. 6. 16.</ls> {@--4@} To get, gain, obtain, share, partake, स हि तस्य न केवलां श्रियं प्रतिपेदे सकलान् गुणानपि <ls>R. 8. 5</ls>, <ls n="R. 8.">13</ls>; <ls n="R.">4. 1</ls>, <ls n="R. 4.">41</ls>; <ls n="R.">11. 34</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 7</ls>; <ls n="R.">19. 55</ls>; <ls>Bg. 14. 14</ls>; <ls>Śi. 10. 63.</ls> {@--5@} To accept, take to; <ls>Śi. 15. 22</ls>; <ls n="Śi.">16. 24.</ls> {@--6@} To recover, reobtain, regain; receive; <ls>Ś. 6. 30</ls>; <ls>Ku. 4. 16</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">7. 22.</ls> {@--7@} To admit, acknowledge; न मासे प्रतिपत्तासे मां चेन्मर्तासि मैथिलि <ls>Bk. 8. 95</ls>; <ls>Ś. 5. 23</ls>; प्रमदाः पतिवर्त्मगा इति प्रतिपन्नं हि विचेतनैरपि <ls>Ku. 4. 33.</ls> {@--8@} To hold, grasp, seize; सुमंत्रप्रतिपन्नरश्मिभिः <ls>R. 14. 47.</ls> {@--9@} To consider, regard, deem, look upon; तद्धनुर्ग्रहणमेव राघवः पत्यपद्यत समर्थमुत्तरं <ls>R. 11. 79.</ls> {@--10@} To undertake, promise to do, take in hand; निर्वाहः प्रतिपन्नवस्तुषु सतामेतद्धि गोत्रव्रतं <ls>Mu. 2. 18</ls>; कार्यं त्वया नः प्रतिपन्नकल्पं <ls>Ku. 3. 14</ls>; <ls>R. 10. 40.</ls> {@--11@} To assent or agree to, consent; तथेति मतिपन्नाय <ls>R. 15. 93.</ls> {@--12@} To do, perform, practise, observe; आचारं प्रतिपद्यस्व <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; <ls>V. 2</ls> ‘do the formal obeisance’; शासनमर्हतां प्रतिपद्यध्वं <ls>Mu. 4. 18</ls> act up to or obey.’ {@--13@} To act or behave towards, deal, do anything to any one (with <ab>gen.</ab> or <ab>loc.</ab>); स कालयवनश्चापि किं कृष्णे प्रत्यपद्यत <ls>Hariv.</ls>; स भवान् मातृपितृवदस्मासु प्रतिपद्यतां <ls>Mb.</ls>; कयमहं प्रतिपत्स्ये <ls>Ś. 5</ls>; न युक्तं भवतास्मासु प्रतिपत्तुमसांप्रतं <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--14@} To give or return (as a reply); कथं प्रतिवचनमपि न प्रतिपद्यसे <ls>Mu. 6</ls>; न जाने किं तातः प्रतिपत्स्यत इति <ls>Ś. 4.</ls> {@--15@} To perceive, become aware of {@--16@} To know, understand, become acquainted with, learn, discover. {@--17@} To roam, wander. {@--18@} To take place, occur. {@--19@} To restore. {@--20@} To permit, allow. {@--21@} To take place, happen. {@--22@} To go back, return. ({%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%}) {@--1@} To give, present, bestow, confer upon, impart; अर्थिभ्यः प्रतिपाद्यमानमनिशं प्रप्नोति वृद्धिं परां <ls>Bh. 2. 16</ls>; <ls>Ms. 11. 4</ls>; गुणवते कन्या प्रतिपादनीया <ls>Ś. 4.</ls> {@--2@} To substantiate, prove, establish by proof; उक्तमेवार्थमुदाहरणेन प्रतिपादयति. {@--3@} To explain, expound. {@--4@} To bring or lead back, convey or transport (to a place). {@--5@} To regard, consider. {@--6@} To assert, declare to be, represent. {@--7@} To procure. {@--8@} To effect, accomplish. {@--9@} To communicate, teach. {@--10@} To appoint to, install (<ab>loc.</ab>). {@--11@} To prepare, get ready.

प्रतिपद् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Access, entrance, way. {@--2@} Beginning, commencement. {@--3@} Intelligence, intellect. {@--4@} The first day of a lunar fortnight. {@--5@} A kettle-drum. {@--6@} An introductory stanza. {@--7@} Rank.
